name: Buffer Social Media
description: Integrate with Buffer Social Media to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Profiles
tools.description: List social media profiles connected to your Buffer account. Returns service names, usernames, and profile IDs.

tools.name: Create Update
tools.description: Create a new social media update (post) via Buffer. Can be scheduled or added to the queue.

tools.name: List Updates
tools.description: List pending or sent updates for a specific Buffer profile. Returns update text, status, and scheduled times.

tools.name: Get Analytics
tools.description: Get interaction analytics for a specific Buffer update. Returns clicks, likes, shares, comments, and reach.

tools.name: Shuffle Queue
tools.description: Shuffle the order of pending updates in a Buffer profile queue. Randomizes the scheduled order.
